About Me

BIO

I'm an experienced Software Engineer in Test and a Full-Stack Web Developer enthusiast based in San Diego, CA. I recently completed a Full-Stack Web Development course from UCSD-Extention and currently working hard to improve the skills I acquired from the course to hopefully someday I may be able to use it in a professional environment.

Skills

Programming Languages: JavaScript (Node.js), Python and Java

JavaScript Framework: Node, Express, React, Sequalize, Axios and Mongoose.

DataBase: MySQL and MongoDB

Experience

I am currently working as an Software Engineer in Test and I have worked with manual as well as automation testing. I work with Android software testing which include both Android OS and Android Apps.

I also work with consumer electronic products such as TV, SoundBar, AVR, Media Boxes and Set-Top Boxes.

Education

I have a bachelor's degree in Computer Science as well as some supplemental courses I got througout the year after I recieved my degree which includes the "Certified Software Tester" bootcamp course from Escondido adult school and my recent one from UCSD Extention "The Coding Bootcamp" which basically thought me how full-stack web application works and how to make one myself using the MERN Stack.
